    • Method Detail

      • searchMultiThread

        public ResultsSimilarities searchMultiThread(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long>> visualWords,
                                             int N,
                                             int k,
                                             java.lang.String[] storages)
                                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function search similar picture with the help of visualwords generated by Iq (request image).
        Parameters:
        visualWords - Visual words of Iq
        N - Number of patch extracted from Iq
        k - Max similar picture from each server
        storages - Search only on these storages (null or empty = all storages)
        Returns:
        Max k*S similar pictures and a list of server state
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Internal error during search
